pr_title: Moved permission type to implementation package

timeline.message: Moved permission type to implementation package

timeline.bodyText: The existing tests all are wired up against Permission (internal type) not CosmosPermissionProperties, So I I think we don't have any tests covering this API. This can be added as separate independent PR.
timeline.author: moderakh

replies.bodyText: Yes, I am already working on those. Will come up with a new PR for those.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: @moderakh - Here is the PR which fixes all the tests: #10100
replies.author: kushagraThapar
